ranawiruwan ha owunge langama gnyathin rakabala ganima sidukarana bawatath owun pilibanda awadhanaya yomukara piliganimata lakkarana bawatath pennum kerena sihiganwana kriyawak lesa me tharagawaliya kriyathmaka karana bawa rambaukwalla mahatha penwa deyi.ranawiru riyal star gayana tharagawaliye idiri katayuthu pilibanda eeye (2) dahawal janamadhya amathyanshaye pawathi sakachchawata ekwemin amathiwaraya me adahas pala kaleya.

kiri dena mawak nam
miniha thada dumbauru patayi, rawula barugahala dapu muduma munakuth ekka.

pasugiya dinawala athiwu rogi thaththwayath hethuwen wawniyawa bandhanagaraye sita prathikara sandaha wawniyawa rohalata athulath kara thibi athi athara mohu pala yana awasthawe rakawalata sita aththe ek bandhanagara niladhariyaku pamanak bawa bandhanagara aaranchi marga sandahan karayi.

keppa wayuwata bak mi pothu kumbauru mul koshaba nati ahurak gena mada gena hinati hal piti deduru ajawaralada washa washi sadikka athiwidayan walagashal dewadara shawindawa thippili me desunu karala thalapa uya thala thelin kanda denu.
nuthana nagarika sundarikarana wyapruthi haraha jogin manthiru ha jalasha idikirim wyapruthi ehi anek paththayi.
oya silon kiyana hariyata sankramanaya wu mul kandayame pirisak thamange janapadayata damanna sudusu namak gana katha karaganna kadapilakata ekras wela wiwidha yojana idiripath karala thiyenawa.
eeth thawamath mese wen nokara apa drawya bara dena pirisak sitinawa.
apitath kiyanna thiyenne ookama thamayi ooyi ...
prathiposhana nambauru kramaya pahatha rupaye aakarayata wenas kala hakiyi.
ehi danata thibena sadhaniya pa්rathipala monawada?
wiruddha lingika andum anda lingika washayen sathutuwi swayan windanaya thulin surathanthayata pathwe.
ow pareto thiyariyath - kathawak thamayi...ooka eeka eka widihata eka eek thana yoda gannawa....
ee wade watina deyak.
obage uputa ganima sathyayak.
ada hawasa ammawa maharagama aayurweda pilika paryeshana aayathanayata ekka giya.
katha ha krikat tharaga wani da narambaimata wadi kamaththak dakwathi.
man nida ganneth unge kabal padure konaka.

jathika saha pradeshiya adhyayana minum hi sakshi pennum kerenuye kalu jakika niwasiyan kamaththa dakwanuye kalu jathikayanta ha ardha washayen sudu asal wasinta wana athara sudu jathikayan kamaththa dakwanuye 0 sita 30 dakwa wu prathishathayakin yuthu kalu jathikayanta wana bawayi.
aasa hithuna de aragena kawa..
in tika welawakata pasu wasantha senanayaka amathiwarayada wadiwel suresh rajya amathiwarayada e.ja.payata yana bawa pawasuha.
shishyathwa panthiya aruna.
me kiyana awayawayata pinsiddhawenna obath mamath jiwiyo una..
‘hata delakshayatama’ eka lipiyak liwimata sudusudayi gataluwak matama mathuwune pamini pirisa desa suparikshakariwa balana witaya.
me prashnayata ow naha kiyana uththara dekama denna puluwan.
nawatha yuda nowadi owun sitha noridawima oba sathuya.
aaryayan dambaadiwata paminimata pera thibu bera warga gana men ma siduhath kumaru upan awadhiyehi shakyayan athara bera warga wi nam ee gana da adhyayanayak kala yuthu wa atha.
namuth adhiwegi marga magin swabhawaya wenas kara thibe.
ee owuhu siyalu denama sadambara skutar himikaruwo wimaya.
parana wahanaya wikuna aluth wahanayak gannata sith we.

shraddha rupawahiniya osse dinapatha wikashanaya wana dharma deshana, dharma sakachcha, wishesha wandana wani wadasatahan saha samaja sathkaraka wadasatahan athulu sadaham wadasatahan mema pituwa osse nawatha oba hata narambaime awasthawa thibe.
‘bi’ positiw wargaye wakugaduwak parithyaga kala haki ayek we nam danwana lesa illa sitiyi.

sigarat ekak bona kello badu, bandinna kalin wena boyi frend kenek ho dennek hitapu kello wesiyo, yalu fit kollek ekka film ekak balanna yana kello badu, ra bo welath gaman biman yana kello godak welawata wesiyo!
mokada ape wage eeke aathin pihiti yodha wayumaya grahaloka na.

wruththiya samithi wisin dashaka gananak pura karana lada yatapath kirimwalin pasu pasugiya wasare sita lowa pura pupura yana kamkaru panthiye nawa aragalawala wishesha lakshanayak wanne wruththiya samithi athulu dakshinanshika sanwidhanawala grahanayen bindemin eewa pana nagimayi.
aayojanayak nokara karanna puluwan, eeth mudal walin aayojanayak nokara witharayi, kalaya aayojanaya karanna wenawa.
habayi oyala mata nayayi.
palaweni wathawata uthsaha karana hinda eyala dila thiyana pinthurayak ganna eka lesi wenawa.
ma danna tharamata nam ‘politikal gosip’ pradhana dharawe pathrawala me aakaraye mulika angayak kale lasantha wikramathungage madhyakaranayayi.
eeka nam pattapal boruwak..
namuth ohu adahas karanne samajaya dan budu dahama ho buddhagama ho anugamana nokirima ha pili nopadima gana nam eeta ek athin ekangayi.
eeka me jathiwadayata erehi kala ulelak.
itha sarala lesa nirmanaya karana lada thadagayaka wasi jalaya randawagena ema jalaya prathamika ala marga osse awashyathawan sandaha prayojanayata ganima.
gala kadagena pissu kelinna ba.
me kathawe nuthana arthakathanayata anuwa, uge eka penayak gasa damunu wita thawa pena dekak liyalayi.

yantham dawal wigena eddi, aachchi ammayi, nandalayi, senuri akkayi seramalla ape gedara awith pirune langa langa ena wishesha dawasa gana katha karanna.

methana indan baluwama kanduwalin wata wela thiyen bandarawela diyathalawa paththa hondata penawa.

me krida sangam tika palanaya kirimata panathe danata athi nithirithi oonatharam pramanawathya.

owun iwathata giye natha.

2008 wasare awasan karthuwedi 17 wani aanduka්rama wyawastha shanshodhanayata anuwa janadhipathi wisin wyawasthadayaka sampadana mandalaya athulu polis, adhikarana, rajya sewa saha mathiwarana komisan sabhawalata samajikayin path nokirima nisa ema aayathana aka්riya wima hethuwen mulika ayithin kada wi athi bawata pa්rakasha karannayi illamin wikalpa pa්rathipaththi kendraya gonukala pethsama wibhagawuye aga winisuru sarath en silwa mahatha idiriyeya.

aarthika gatalu aanduwa wisinma athikaragaththak bawath meyata wisandum lesa rajya aayathana kunu kollayata wikuna damamin sitina bawath hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawasayi.
ee salli walin thel mila adu karala janathawata sahana denna kiyalath kiwwa.
ee sandaha yapanaye deshapalana nayakayo, siwil kriyadharayo ha sirakaruwange gnyathihu da ekwa sitiyaha.
wareka api unge maga haras karamin kuda gal katayak ho ewani yamak damannemu.
ane miya gihilla thiyenne diwya.
tika welawakin merita aharuna.
maka damana ladi athi ho aakruthigatha, saha nathi wi ho sangawa kotas walin kotas athara daththa gonu nawatha.
thawa genna epa, denna amathikam na – janadhipathi

rajya ha pudgalika anshaye kshethra rasakama aayathanika mulya, ginumkaranaya ha wigananaya pilibanda ha banku anshaye jyeshta thanathuru rasak hobawa athi korali pitars mahathmiya kshethraye wasara 20 kata adhika athdakim sapura thibe.

mewani tharagayak kuda daruwan wu apa udesa eda pawathwuye ayi dayi ma hata danudu sitha gatha nohaka. 1 wasara sita 5 wasara dakwa panthi pawathwunu ape kuda pasale siyaluma daruwanta me sandaha sahabhagi wannata awasara thibuni.
ehi prathipalayak washayen saukhya baladharinta erehiwa wirodhatha wyapara kipayak pawathwannatada swadeshiya janathawa katayuthu kara thibini.
oowa moda katha .
mema yanawalin hangenne hela nimawumkaruwan manawa guwan thakshanaya pilibanda dana siti bawaya.
rajapaksha kalaya thulath niwaradiwa itu karanna bariwunu dewal kipayakuth thibuna.
daruwaku melowata bihikala pamanin mawu keneku wanne natha.
ee siyalla kerenne krushi rasayanika drawya bhawithayen thorawa ya.
ese nam apata awashya wanne thakshanaya padanam karagath karmantha bawa kiwa yuthuyi.
wishwa widyalaya sadaha sudusukam nolabimen oba kisi witakath pasubata wiya yuthu nowe.mandayath thawamath
rajathuma thawama awulaka bawayi peni yanne…

rathri 9 sita ude 6 dakwa prasiddha sthanayanhi gawasemin warada karana daruwanata danduwam panawimata polisiyata hakiyawak atha.wayasa 10 – 17 dakwa aparadha karana lamayin athadanguwata ganimatath chodana gonukirimatath ida atha.
atham guruwarunge kriyakalapayan nisa demapiyanta ha daruwanta guruwarun pilibanda wishwasaya nathiwela.mekata atham guru wruththiya samithi wagakiwayuthuyi.
araliya gaha mandirayata piwisena pradhana doratuwa aasannayema pirith mandapaya idi kara atha.
eya samana sanskruthinwala sita pamini pudgalayan samaga rakiyawaksoya ganimata ha wyapara arambaimata wadath pahasu we.
